sentences.sContent: A small storefront leads to an English-language school run by Disney.
sentences.sContent_eng: A small storefront leads to an English-language school run by Disney.
sentences.sCn: 一个小的店面通向由迪尼斯经营的英语语言学校。

sentences.sContent: That small number Wei quoted would presumably fund business with an online storefront and a small amount of goods, which could be sold for proceeds to pay the loan and buy more wares.
sentences.sContent_eng: That small number Wei quoted would presumably fund business with an online storefront and a small amount of goods, which could be sold for proceeds to pay the loan and buy more wares.
sentences.sCn: 据推测，魏提到的少量自有资金或许将用来开设在线店面，以及购置少量货物，这些货物出售后的款项将用来继续提供贷款，以及购买更多货物。

sentences.sContent: Anybody can rent out a storefront and start their own church, and many people have done so.
sentences.sContent_eng: Anybody can rent out a storefront and start their own church, and many people have done so.
sentences.sCn: 任何人都可以租一间店面，开创自己的教会，而且也有很多人这样做了。

trans.tranOther: the part of a store that faces the street
